topics.body:
"@mariomarc":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/5583435a636872357e0001a8#post_5583435a636872357e0001a8
Krystal probably is going to be removed completely from the series unfortunately.


Wow; someone made a good point on 4chan about a indie game: a new game that was unveiled called "unravel" is probably going to be torn a fucking new one cause the guy making it is making it cause he was inspired by his family and doesn't have any ties to the pretentious hipstershit circle in the indie crowd.

If you don't get what I'm talking about:
Unravel is a good looking game that is probably going to be good -> 99% probability that loltaku is going to go "A indie game that was made by someone outside our hipster click?!  MURDER!  KILL! DESTROY HIM!"

Wow; I actually made myself kind of sad with this post.  Five years ago indie games used to be the future of gaming and now the second someone independent makes a indie game who isn't in the hipster shit crowd they get torn a fucking new one.
topics.author: 38b55cdf63616403d7560600
